description.text: Garuda Wisnu Kencana is a 240 hectares private social stop on the Bukit Peninsula at the southern end of the island of Bali in Indonesia. Inside have the statue of Vishnu is 23 meters (75.5 ft) high, despite the fact that the first arrangement was for a 146-meter (479 ft) gold-plated Vishnu riding Garuda on top of a 11 story amusement complex. Garuda wing compass will be 64 meters (210.0 ft) over. When its finished, it will be the biggest statue on the planet. The thought was not without contention, and religious powers on the island griped that its huge size may disturb the profound parity of the island

description.text: Padang Padang Beach also known with name Labuan Sait Beach is a renowned surf point in Bali with the incredible waves and white sandy extend 100 meters from the north to the south. This surf point is arranged the white stone slope with nature landscape to the Indian Ocean. Padang Padang Beach is one of the popular surf focuses in the island of god and turn into a most loved surf spot for surfers to investigate the incredible and testing waves. In the event that you are experience or genius surfer, is the perfect spot for you to appreciate the surf escapades amid your occasions in the heaven island of Bali.

title.title: Uluwatu Temple | Bali ATV Ride and Uluwatu Tour

image.title: Uluwatu Temple | Bali ATV Ride and Uluwatu Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Uluwatu Temple is a Balinese ocean sanctuary in Bali. Inherent the eleventh century, it is one of nine directional temple intended to shield Bali from wickedness spirits. The structure was altogether extended by a Javanese sage, Empu Kuturan in the eleventh Century. An alternate savvy from East Java, Dang Hyang Nirartha is credited for building the padmasana sanctums and is guaranteed to have achieved Moksha here. Significantly more wonderful than the sanctuary itself is its area, roosted on a lofty bluff 70 meters over the thundering Indian sea waves.

price.title: Bali ATV Ride and Uluwatu Tour Packages Price :
price.content:
Bali ATV Ride and Uluwatu Tour Packages Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,300,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 825,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali ATV Ride and Uluwatu Tour Packages Price Included :

  • Comfortable Private Car
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Mineral Water
  • Entrance Fee to all site
  • 2 Hours ATV Ride Adventure
  • ATV Bike (Single ATV Bike or Tandem ATV Bike)
  • Professional ATV Instructor
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
